sent.desc: Render as a sent message (so from current user)

bg-color.desc: Color name for chat bubble background from the Quasar Color Palette

text-color.desc: Color name for chat bubble text from the Quasar Color Palette

avatar.desc: URL to the avatar image of the author; Suggestion: use a static resource

text.desc: Array of strings that are the message body. Strings are not sanitized (see details in docs)

default.desc: Can you this slot to define a custom message (overrides props)
